00032 /* basic includes. */
00033 #include "gfs-defines.h"
00034 #include "gfs-typedefs.h"
00035 #include "gfs-input-files-list.h"

00037 /* function prototypes. */
00038 INPUT_FILE *new_input_file (const char *filepath);
00039 INPUT_FILE *add_input_file (INPUT_FILE * listp, INPUT_FILE * newp);
00040 
00041 void print_input_files (FILE * stream, INPUT_FILES * listp);
00042 void free_input_files (INPUT_FILES * listp);
00043 
00044 BOOL input_file_exists (INPUT_FILES * listp, cstring filepath);
00045 ulong count_input_files (INPUT_FILES * listp);

00047 /* functions. */
00048 
00062 INPUT_FILE *
00063 new_input_file (const char *filepath)
00064 {
00065   /* externs. */
00066 
00067   /* function externs. */
00068   extern char *estrdup (const char *);
00069   extern void *emalloc (size_t);
00070 
00071   INPUT_FILE *newp;
00072 
00073   /* allocate enough memory space. */
00074   newp = (INPUT_FILE *) emalloc (sizeof (INPUT_FILE));
00075 
00076   /* init the node list and store the string. */
00077   newp->ptr = NULL;
00078   newp->path = estrdup (filepath);
00079   newp->next = NULL;
00080 
00081   /* return the new node item. */
00082   return newp;
00083 }
00084 
00099 INPUT_FILE *
00100 add_input_file (INPUT_FILE * listp, INPUT_FILE * newp)
00101 {
00102   INPUT_FILE *p;
00103 
00104   /* if the list is empty. */
00105   if (listp == NULL)
00106     return newp;
00107 
00108   /* go to the end of the list. */
00109   for (p = listp; p->next != NULL; p = p->next)
00110     continue;
00111 
00112   /* add to the end of the list `newp'. */
00113   p->next = newp;
00114 
00115   /* return the list. */
00116   return listp;
00117 }
00118 
00131 void
00132 print_input_files (FILE * stream, INPUT_FILES * listp)
00133 {
00134   /* walk through the linked list. */
00135   while (listp != NULL)
00136     {
00137       /* print the input file path. */
00138       fprintf (stream, " * [%s]%s", listp->path, NEW_LINE);
00139 
00140       /* move to the next list node. */
00141       listp = listp->next;
00142     }
00143 }
00144 
00155 void
00156 free_input_files (INPUT_FILES * listp)
00157 {
00158   /* walk through the linked list. */
00159   while (listp != NULL)
00160     {
00161       INPUT_FILE *nextp = listp->next;
00162       free (listp->path);
00163       free (listp);
00164       listp = nextp;
00165     }
00166 }
00167 
00182 BOOL
00183 input_file_exists (INPUT_FILES * listp, cstring filepath)
00184 {
00185   /* walk through the linked list. */
00186   while (listp != NULL)
00187     {
00188       /* has already occurred. */
00189       if (!strcmp (filepath, listp->path))
00190         return true;
00191 
00192       /* move to the next list node. */
00193       listp = listp->next;
00194     }
00195 
00196   /* it is the first occurrence. */
00197   return false;
00198 }
00199 
00208 ulong
00209 count_input_files (INPUT_FILES * listp)
00210 {
00211   /* the sum of nodes in the list. */
00212   register ulong cnt;
00213 
00214   /* count the nodes of the list. */
00215   for (cnt = 0L; listp != NULL; cnt++)
00216     listp = listp->next;
00217 
00218   /* return nodes list counter. */
00219   return cnt;
00220 }
